Class CustomerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • view_controller.CustomerController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class CustomerController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class controls the Customer Form.

      • onCustSave

        public void onCustSave​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                throws java.io.IOException,
                       java.sql.SQLException
        Checks if all fields of the Customer form are entered correctly. If fields are correct, the information is passed to the CustomerAccess class and are added to the mySQL database. The user is returned to the Home Page if successful.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - the Save button is clicked
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - prevents app from crashing if incorrect SQL syntax is used
        java.io.IOException - prevents app from crashing if the Home Page fxml file isn't found

      • onCustCancel

        public void onCustCancel​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Quits the Customer Form and returns the user back to the Home Page.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - the Cancel button is clicked
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - prevents the app from crashing if the Home Page fxml file isn't found

      • onDivisionClicked

        public void onDivisionClicked​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
        Checks if the Country selection has been made. If it hasn't been made the Division list remains empty. If a country is selected then the associated divisions of the Country are loaded in the FirstLevel ComboBox list.
        Parameters:
        mouseEvent - the ComboBox for Division is clicked

      • onCountryClicked

        public void onCountryClicked​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
        Clears the Division selection so that if another country is selected, the list is prepared to load the new Divisions.
        Parameters:
        mouseEvent - the Country ComboBox is clicked and resets the Division box.
